feed.title: Track Awesome Python Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: An opinionated list of awesome Python frameworks, libraries, software and resources.

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Sep 16 - Sep 22, 2024
entry.content:
Code Analysis

  • Code Linters
    • flake8 (⭐3.6k) - A wrapper around pycodestyle, pyflakes and McCabe.
      • awesome-flake8-extensions (⭐1.3k)
    • pylint (⭐5.5k) - A fully customizable source code analyzer.
    • ruff (⭐41k) - An extremely fast Python linter and code formatter.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Sep 16 - Sep 22, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Apr 08 - Apr 14, 2024
entry.content:
Admin Panels

  • streamlit (⭐40k) - A framework which lets you build dashboards, generate reports, or create chat apps in minutes.

Deep Learning

  • stable-baselines3 (⭐11k) - PyTorch implementations of Stable Baselines (deep) reinforcement learning algorithms.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Apr 08 - Apr 14, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Feb 19 - Feb 25, 2024
entry.content:
Admin Panels

  • django-grappelli (⭐3.9k) - A jazzy skin for the Django Admin-Interface.

Algorithms and Design Patterns

  • Algorithms
    • algorithms (⭐25k) - Minimal examples of data structures and algorithms.
    • python-ds (⭐2.9k) - A collection of data structure and algorithms for coding interviews.
    • sortedcontainers (⭐3.8k) - Fast and pure-Python implementation of sorted collections.
    • thealgorithms (⭐203k) - All Algorithms implemented in Python.

ASGI Servers

  • hypercorn (⭐1.3k) - An ASGI and WSGI Server based on Hyper libraries and inspired by Gunicorn.

Asynchronous Programming

  • concurrent.futures - (Python standard library) A high-level interface for asynchronously executing callables.
  • multiprocessing - (Python standard library) Process-based parallelism.
  • twisted (⭐5.8k) - An event-driven networking engine.
  • eventlet (⭐1.3k) - Asynchronous framework with WSGI support.
  • gevent (⭐6.4k) - A coroutine-based Python networking library that uses greenlet (⭐1.7k).

Audio

  • Audio
    • audioread (⭐513) - Cross-library (GStreamer + Core Audio + MAD + FFmpeg) audio decoding.
    • audioFlux (⭐3.1k) - A library for audio and music analysis, feature extraction.
    • dejavu (⭐6.6k) - Audio fingerprinting and recognition.
    • kapre (⭐932) - Keras Audio Preprocessors.
    • librosa (⭐7.7k) - Python library for audio and music analysis.
    • matchering (⭐2.1k) - A library for automated reference audio mastering.
    • mingus - An advanced music theory and notation package with MIDI file and playback support.
    • pyaudioanalysis (⭐6.1k) - Audio feature extraction, classification, segmentation and applications.
    • pydub (⭐9.5k) - Manipulate audio with a simple and easy high level interface.
    • timeside (⭐387) - Open web audio processing framework.

Authentication

  • OAuth
    • authlib (⭐4.9k) - JavaScript Object Signing and Encryption draft implementation.
    • django-allauth (⭐10k) - Authentication app for Django that "just works."
    • django-oauth-toolkit (⭐3.3k) - OAuth 2 goodies for Django.
    • oauthlib (⭐2.9k) - A generic and thorough implementation of the OAuth request-signing logic.

Build Tools

  • bitbake (⭐464) - A make-like build tool for embedded Linux.
  • buildout (⭐589) - A build system for creating, assembling and deploying applications from multiple parts.
  • platformio (⭐8.4k) - A console tool to build code with different development platforms.
  • scons (⭐2.2k) - A software construction tool.

Built-in Classes Enhancement

  • box (⭐2.7k) - Python dictionaries with advanced dot notation access.
  • dotteddict (⭐211) - A library that provides a method of accessing lists and dicts with a dotted path notation.

CMS

  • wagtail (⭐19k) - A Django content management system.

Caching

  • dogpile.cache (⭐269) - dogpile.cache is a next generation replacement for Beaker made by the same authors.
  • hermescache - Python caching library with tag-based invalidation and dogpile effect prevention.
  • python-diskcache (⭐2.6k) - SQLite and file backed cache backend with faster lookups than memcached and redis.

Command-line Interface Development

  • Command-line Application Development
    • cement (⭐1.3k) - CLI Application Framework for Python.
    • click (⭐17k) - A package for creating beautiful command line interfaces in a composable way.
    • cliff (⭐248) - A framework for creating command-line programs with multi-level commands.
    • python-fire (⭐28k) - A library for creating command line interfaces from absolutely any Python object.
    • python-prompt-toolkit (⭐9.8k) - A library for building powerful interactive command lines.

Computer Vision

  • easyocr (⭐27k) - Ready-to-use OCR with 40+ languages supported.
  • kornia (⭐11k) - Open Source Differentiable Computer Vision Library for PyTorch.
  • opencv - Open Source Computer Vision Library.

Configuration Files

  • configobj (⭐327) - INI file parser with validation.
  • python-decouple (⭐2.9k) - Strict separation of settings from code.

Cryptography

  • cryptography (⭐7.1k) - A package designed to expose cryptographic primitives and recipes to Python developers.

Data Analysis

  • pandas - A library providing high-performance, easy-to-use data structures and data analysis tools.
  • aws-sdk-pandas (⭐4k) - Pandas on AWS.
  • datasette (⭐10k) - An open source multi-tool for exploring and publishing data.
  • optimus (⭐1.5k) - Agile Data Science Workflows made easy with PySpark.

Data Validation

  • cerberus (⭐3.2k) - A lightweight and extensible data validation library.
  • colander (⭐457) - Validating and deserializing data obtained via XML, JSON, an HTML form post.
  • jsonschema (⭐4.8k) - An implementation of JSON Schema for Python.
  • schematics (⭐2.6k) - Data Structure Validation.
  • pydantic (⭐24k) - Data validation using Python type hints.

Data Visualization

  • altair (⭐9.9k) - Declarative statistical visualization library for Python.
  • bokeh (⭐20k) - Interactive Web Plotting for Python.
  • cartopy (⭐1.5k) - A cartographic python library with matplotlib support.
  • matplotlib (⭐21k) - A Python 2D plotting library.
  • pygal (⭐2.7k) - A Python SVG Charts Creator.
  • pygraphviz (⭐812) - Python interface to Graphviz.
  • pyqtgraph (⭐4.1k) - Interactive and realtime 2D/3D/Image plotting and science/engineering widgets.
  • seaborn (⭐13k) - Statistical data visualization using Matplotlib.
  • vispy (⭐3.5k) - High-performance scientific visualization based on OpenGL.

Database

  • zodb (⭐724) - A native object database for Python. A key-value and object graph database.

Database Drivers

  • MySQL - awesome-mysql
    • mysqlclient (⭐2.5k) - MySQL connector with Python 3 support (mysql-python fork).
    • pymysql (⭐7.8k) - A pure Python MySQL driver compatible to mysql-python.
  • PostgreSQL - awesome-postgres (⭐11k)
    • psycopg (⭐2k) - The most popular PostgreSQL adapter for Python.
  • SQlite - awesome-sqlite (⭐356)
    • sqlite3 - (Python standard library) SQlite interface compliant with DB-API 2.0.
    • sqlite-utils (⭐1.9k) - Python CLI utility and library for manipulating SQLite databases.
  • NoSQL Databases
    • cassandra-driver (⭐1.4k) - The Python Driver for Apache Cassandra.
    • happybase (⭐609) - A developer-friendly library for Apache HBase.
    • kafka-python (⭐5.8k) - The Python client for Apache Kafka.
    • pymongo (⭐4.2k) - The official Python client for MongoDB.
    • motor (⭐2.5k) - The async Python driver for MongoDB.
    • redis-py (⭐13k) - The Python client for Redis.

Date and Time

  • arrow (⭐8.9k) - A Python library that offers a sensible and human-friendly approach to creating, manipulating, formatting and converting dates, times and timestamps.
  • pendulum (⭐6.5k) - Python datetimes made easy.
  • pytz - World timezone definitions, modern and historical. Brings the tz database into Python.

Deep Learning

  • pytorch-lightning (⭐30k) - Deep learning framework to train, deploy, and ship AI products Lightning fast.
  • theano (⭐9.9k) - A library for fast numerical computation.

DevOps Tools

  • Backup
    • borg (⭐12k) - A deduplicating archiver with compression and encryption.

Distribution

  • py2app (⭐402) - Freezes Python scripts (Mac OS X).
  • py2exe (⭐948) - Freezes Python scripts (Windows).
  • pyinstaller (⭐12k) - Converts Python programs into stand-alone executables (cross-platform).

Downloader

  • youtube-dl (⭐136k) - A command-line program to download videos from YouTube and other video sites.

File Manipulation

  • path.py (⭐1.1k) - A module wrapper for os.path.

Functional Programming

  • coconut (⭐4.2k) - A variant of Python built for simple, elegant, Pythonic functional programming.
  • cytoolz (⭐1.1k) - Cython implementation of Toolz: High performance functional utilities.
  • toolz (⭐4.9k) - A collection of functional utilities for iterators, functions, and dictionaries.

Geolocation

  • geodjango - A world-class geographic web framework.
  • geojson (⭐969) - Python bindings and utilities for GeoJSON.

HTML Manipulation

  • beautifulsoup - Providing Pythonic idioms for iterating, searching, and modifying HTML or XML.
  • markupsafe (⭐660) - Implements a XML/HTML/XHTML Markup safe string for Python.

HTTP Clients

  • urllib3 (⭐3.9k) - A HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post support, sanity friendly.

Hardware

  • pynput (⭐2k) - A library to control and monitor input devices.

Image Processing

  • pymatting (⭐1.9k) - A library for alpha matting.
  • quads (⭐1.2k) - Computer art based on quadtrees.
  • wand (⭐1.5k) - Python bindings for MagickWand, C API for ImageMagick.

Implementations

  • cpython (⭐68k) - Default, most widely used implementation of the Python programming language written in C.
  • cython (⭐10k) - Optimizing Static Compiler for Python.
  • clpython (⭐380) - Implementation of the Python programming language written in Common Lisp.
  • ironpython (⭐2.7k) - Implementation of the Python programming language written in C#.
  • micropython (⭐21k) - A lean and efficient Python programming language implementation.
  • numba (⭐11k) - Python JIT compiler to LLVM aimed at scientific Python.
  • peachpy (⭐2k) - x86-64 assembler embedded in Python.
  • pypy - A very fast and compliant implementation of the Python language.
  • pyston (⭐2.5k) - A Python implementation using JIT techniques.

RESTful API

  • Django
    • django-rest-framework (⭐29k) - A powerful and flexible toolkit to build web APIs.
    • django-tastypie (⭐3.9k) - Creating delicious APIs for Django apps.
  • Framework agnostic
    • falcon (⭐9.7k) - A high-performance framework for building cloud APIs and web app backends.
    • fastapi (⭐87k) - A modern, fast, web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+ based on standard Python type hints.
    • hug (⭐6.9k) - A Python 3 framework for cleanly exposing APIs.
    • sandman2 (⭐2k) - Automated REST APIs for existing database-driven systems.
    • sanic (⭐18k) - A Python 3.6+ web server and web framework that's written to go fast.

Web Crawling

  • feedparser (⭐2.2k) - Universal feed parser.
  • mechanicalsoup (⭐4.8k) - A Python library for automating interaction with websites.
  • scrapy (⭐58k) - A fast high-level screen scraping and web crawling framework.

Web Frameworks

  • Synchronous
    • django (⭐84k) - The most popular web framework in Python.
      • awesome-django (⭐1.8k)
      • awesome-django (⭐10k)
    • flask (⭐70k) - A microframework for Python.
      • awesome-flask (⭐13k)
    • pyramid - A small, fast, down-to-earth, open source Python web framework.
      • awesome-pyramid (⭐559)
    • masonite (⭐2.3k) - The modern and developer centric Python web framework.
  • Asynchronous
    • tornado (⭐22k) - A web framework and asynchronous networking library.

WSGI Servers

  • uwsgi - A project aims at developing a full stack for building hosting services, written in C.

Newsletters

  • Pycoder's Weekly
  • Python Weekly

Podcasts

  • Python Test
entry.summary: 93 awesome projects updated on Feb 19 - Feb 25, 2024

Game Development

Science

  • Open Babel - A chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data.

Code Analysis

GraphQL

  • graphene (⭐8.2k) - GraphQL framework for Python.

Shell

  • xonsh (⭐8.9k) - A Python-powered, cross-platform, Unix-gazing shell language and command prompt.

Penetration Testing

  • sqlmap (⭐35k) - Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool.

Static Site Generator

  • makesite (⭐1.8k) - Simple, lightweight, and magic-free static site/blog generator (< 130 lines).

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Aug 17 - Aug 23, 2020

GUI Development

Job Scheduler

  • Prefect (⭐20k) - A modern workflow orchestration framework that makes it easy to build, schedule and monitor robust data pipelines.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Aug 17 - Aug 23, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Aug 03 - Aug 09, 2020
entry.content:
ASGI Servers

  • uvicorn (⭐9.5k) - A lightning-fast ASGI server implementation, using uvloop and httptools.

Asynchronous Programming

  • uvloop (⭐11k) - Ultra fast asyncio event loop.

Built-in Classes Enhancement

  • dataclasses - (Python standard library) Data classes.

Code Analysis

  • Static Type Checkers, also see awesome-python-typing (⭐1.8k)
    • mypy (⭐19k) - Check variable types during compile time.
    • pyre-check (⭐7.1k) - Performant type checking.
    • typeshed (⭐4.7k) - Collection of library stubs for Python, with static types.

Computer Vision

  • tesserocr (⭐2.1k) - Another simple, Pillow-friendly, wrapper around the tesseract-ocr API for OCR.

Configuration Files

  • hydra (⭐9.5k) - Hydra is a framework for elegantly configuring complex applications.

Data Visualization

  • plotnine (⭐4.3k) - A grammar of graphics for Python based on ggplot2.

DevOps Tools

  • Configuration Management
    • ansible (⭐66k) - A radically simple IT automation platform.
    • cloudinit (⭐3.3k) - A multi-distribution package that handles early initialization of a cloud instance.
    • openstack - Open source software for building private and public clouds.
    • pyinfra (⭐4.3k) - A versatile CLI tools and python libraries to automate infrastructure.
    • saltstack (⭐15k) - Infrastructure automation and management system.
  • Process Management
    • supervisor (⭐8.8k) - Supervisor process control system for UNIX.

Distribution

  • pyarmor (⭐4.4k) - A tool used to obfuscate python scripts, bind obfuscated scripts to fixed machine or expire obfuscated scripts.

Downloader

  • akshare (⭐12k) - A financial data interface library, built for human beings!

Job Scheduler

  • Airflow - Airflow is a platform to programmatically author, schedule and monitor workflows.

Logging

  • logging - (Python standard library) Logging facility for Python.

Package Management

  • pip - The package installer for Python.
    • pip-tools (⭐7.9k) - A set of tools to keep your pinned Python dependencies fresh.
    • PyPI
  • poetry (⭐33k) - Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

Package Repositories

  • warehouse (⭐3.8k) - Next generation Python Package Repository (PyPI).

RPC Servers

  • zeroRPC (⭐3.2k) - zerorpc is a flexible RPC implementation based on ZeroMQ and MessagePack.

Search

  • elasticsearch-dsl-py (⭐3.9k) - The official high-level Python client for Elasticsearch.
  • elasticsearch-py - The official low-level Python client for Elasticsearch.

Static Site Generator

  • mkdocs (⭐21k) - Markdown friendly documentation generator.
  • pelican (⭐13k) - Static site generator that supports Markdown and reST syntax.

Template Engine

  • Jinja2 (⭐11k) - A modern and designer friendly templating language.

Video

  • vidgear (⭐3.6k) - Most Powerful multi-threaded Video Processing framework.
entry.summary: 23 awesome projects updated on Aug 03 - Aug 09, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Apr 13 - Apr 19, 2020
entry.content:
CMS

  • indico (⭐1.9k) - A feature-rich event management system, made @ CERN.

Command-line Tools

  • CLI Enhancements
    • httpie (⭐36k) - A command line HTTP client, a user-friendly cURL replacement.
    • iredis (⭐2.7k) - Redis CLI with autocompletion and syntax highlighting.
    • litecli (⭐3k) - SQLite CLI with autocompletion and syntax highlighting.
    • mycli (⭐12k) - MySQL CLI with autocompletion and syntax highlighting.
    • pgcli (⭐13k) - PostgreSQL CLI with autocompletion and syntax highlighting.

Distribution

  • shiv (⭐1.9k) - A command line utility for building fully self-contained zipapps (PEP 441), but with all their dependencies included.

Functional Programming

  • more-itertools (⭐3.9k) - More routines for operating on iterables, beyond itertools.

RPC Servers

  • RPyC (⭐1.6k) (Remote Python Call) - A transparent and symmetric RPC library for Python

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Mar 30 - Apr 05, 2020
entry.content:
Natural Language Processing

  • General
    • gensim (⭐16k) - Topic Modeling for Humans.
    • langid.py (⭐2.4k) - Stand-alone language identification system.
    • nltk - A leading platform for building Python programs to work with human language data.
    • pattern (⭐8.8k) - A web mining module.
    • polyglot (⭐2.3k) - Natural language pipeline supporting hundreds of languages.
    • pytext (⭐6.3k) - A natural language modeling framework based on PyTorch.
    • PyTorch-NLP (⭐2.2k) - A toolkit enabling rapid deep learning NLP prototyping for research.
    • spacy - A library for industrial-strength natural language processing in Python and Cython.
    • Stanza (⭐7.5k) - The Stanford NLP Group's official Python library, supporting 60+ languages.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Mar 30 - Apr 05, 2020

  • diagrams (⭐41k) - Diagram as Code.

entry.content:
Science

  • Karate Club (⭐2.2k) - Unsupervised machine learning toolbox for graph structured data.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Jan 27 - Feb 02, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Jan 20 - Jan 26, 2020
entry.content:
Email

  • Mail Servers
    • modoboa (⭐3.3k) - A mail hosting and management platform including a modern Web UI.
    • salmon (⭐652) - A Python Mail Server.
  • Clients
    • imbox (⭐1.2k) - Python IMAP for Humans.
    • yagmail (⭐2.7k) - Yet another Gmail/SMTP client.
  • Others
    • flanker (⭐1.6k) - An email address and Mime parsing library.
    • mailer (⭐281) - High-performance extensible mail delivery framework.

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on May 27 - Jun 02, 2019
entry.content:
Cryptography

  • paramiko (⭐9.4k) - The leading native Python SSHv2 protocol library.

Editor Plugins and IDEs

  • Visual Studio Code
    • Python - The official VSCode extension with rich support for Python.

Environment Management

  • virtualenv (⭐4.9k) - A tool to create isolated Python environments.

GUI Development

  • Eel (⭐6.7k) - A library for making simple Electron-like offline HTML/JS GUI apps.
  • PySimpleGUI (⭐14k) - Wrapper for tkinter, Qt, WxPython and Remi.
  • pywebview (⭐5.3k) - A lightweight cross-platform native wrapper around a webview component.

Game Development

  • Harfang3D - Python framework for 3D, VR and game development.
  • Panda3D - 3D game engine developed by Disney.

Geolocation

  • django-countries (⭐1.5k) - A Django app that provides a country field for models and forms.

HTML Manipulation

  • cssutils - A CSS library for Python.

Job Scheduler

  • Joblib - A set of tools to provide lightweight pipelining in Python.

Science

  • Colour - Implementing a comprehensive number of colour theory transformations and algorithms.

Testing

  • Code Coverage
    • coverage - Code coverage measurement.
  • Fake Data
    • fake2db (⭐2.3k) - Fake database generator.
    • faker (⭐19k) - A Python package that generates fake data.
    • mimesis (⭐4.6k) - is a Python library that help you generate fake data.
    • radar - Generate random datetime / time.

Text Processing

  • General
    • chardet (⭐2.3k) - Python 2/3 compatible character encoding detector.
    • difflib - (Python standard library) Helpers for computing deltas.
    • ftfy (⭐3.9k) - Makes Unicode text less broken and more consistent automagically.
    • fuzzywuzzy (⭐9.3k) - Fuzzy String Matching.
    • Levenshtein (⭐1.3k) - Fast computation of Levenshtein distance and string similarity.
    • pangu.py (⭐266) - Paranoid text spacing.
    • pyfiglet (⭐1.4k) - An implementation of figlet written in Python.
    • pypinyin (⭐5.1k) - Convert Chinese hanzi (漢字) to pinyin (拼音).
    • textdistance (⭐3.5k) - Compute distance between sequences with 30+ algorithms.
    • unidecode - ASCII transliterations of Unicode text.

URL Manipulation

  • webargs (⭐1.4k) - A friendly library for parsing HTTP request arguments with built-in support for popular web frameworks.

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Mar 04 - Mar 10, 2019
entry.content:
Admin Panels

  • ajenti (⭐7.8k) - The admin panel your servers deserve.
  • wooey (⭐2.2k) - A Django app which creates automatic web UIs for Python scripts.

Audio

  • Metadata
    • beets (⭐14k) - A music library manager and MusicBrainz tagger.
    • eyed3 (⭐590) - A tool for working with audio files, specifically MP3 files containing ID3 metadata.
    • mutagen (⭐1.7k) - A Python module to handle audio metadata.
    • tinytag (⭐767) - A library for reading music meta data of MP3, OGG, FLAC and Wave files.

Authentication

  • JWT
    • pyjwt (⭐5.4k) - JSON Web Token implementation in Python.
    • python-jose (⭐1.6k) - A JOSE implementation in Python.

Build Tools

  • pybuilder (⭐1.8k) - A continuous build tool written in pure Python.

CMS

  • feincms (⭐1k) - One of the most advanced Content Management Systems built on Django.

Caching

  • beaker (⭐536) - A WSGI middleware for sessions and caching.
  • pylibmc (⭐486) - A Python wrapper around the libmemcached interface.

ChatOps Tools

  • errbot (⭐3.2k) - The easiest and most popular chatbot to implement ChatOps.

Code Analysis

  • Code Formatters
    • black (⭐40k) - The uncompromising Python code formatter.
    • isort (⭐6.8k) - A Python utility / library to sort imports.
    • yapf (⭐14k) - Yet another Python code formatter from Google.

Configuration Files

  • configparser - (Python standard library) INI file parser.

Cryptography

  • pynacl (⭐1.1k) - Python binding to the Networking and Cryptography (NaCl) library.

Database

  • pickleDB (⭐1k) - A simple and lightweight key-value store for Python.
  • tinydb (⭐7.2k) - A tiny, document-oriented database.

Debugging Tools

  • pdb-like Debugger
    • ipdb (⭐1.9k) - IPython-enabled pdb.
    • pudb (⭐3.1k) - A full-screen, console-based Python debugger.
  • Tracing
    • manhole (⭐386) - Debugging UNIX socket connections and present the stacktraces for all threads and an interactive prompt.
    • python-hunter (⭐820) - A flexible code tracing toolkit.

Deep Learning

  • keras (⭐63k) - A high-level neural networks library and capable of running on top of either TensorFlow or Theano.
  • pytorch (⭐91k) - Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU acceleration.
  • tensorflow (⭐191k) - The most popular Deep Learning framework created by Google.

Distributed Computing

  • Batch Processing
    • dask (⭐13k) - A flexible parallel computing library for analytic computing.
    • luigi (⭐18k) - A module that helps you build complex pipelines of batch jobs.
    • PySpark (⭐41k) - Apache Spark Python API.
    • Ray (⭐38k) - A system for parallel and distributed Python that unifies the machine learning ecosystem.
  • Stream Processing
    • faust (⭐6.8k) - A stream processing library, porting the ideas from Kafka Streams to Python.
    • streamparse (⭐1.5k) - Run Python code against real-time streams of data via Apache Storm.

Documentation

  • pdoc (⭐2.2k) - Epydoc replacement to auto generate API documentation for Python libraries.

Editor Plugins and IDEs

  • Emacs
    • elpy (⭐1.9k) - Emacs Python Development Environment.
  • IDE
    • PyCharm - Commercial Python IDE by JetBrains. Has free community edition available.
    • spyder (⭐8.8k) - Open Source Python IDE.

GUI Development

  • Gooey (⭐21k) - Turn command line programs into a full GUI application with one line.

Miscellaneous

  • boltons (⭐6.6k) - A set of pure-Python utilities.
  • tryton - A general purpose business framework.

Natural Language Processing

  • Chinese
    • funNLP (⭐75k) - A collection of tools and datasets for Chinese NLP.
    • jieba (⭐34k) - The most popular Chinese text segmentation library.
    • pkuseg-python (⭐6.6k) - A toolkit for Chinese word segmentation in various domains.
    • snownlp (⭐6.6k) - A library for processing Chinese text.

Network Virtualization

  • mininet (⭐5.6k) - A popular network emulator and API written in Python.
  • napalm (⭐2.3k) - Cross-vendor API to manipulate network devices.

ORM

  • Relational Databases
    • Django Models - The Django ORM.
    • SQLAlchemy - The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper.
      • awesome-sqlalchemy (⭐3k)
    • dataset (⭐4.8k) - Store Python dicts in a database - works with SQLite, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.
    • orator (⭐1.4k) - The Orator ORM provides a simple yet beautiful ActiveRecord implementation.
    • orm (⭐1.8k) - An async ORM.
    • peewee (⭐12k) - A small, expressive ORM.
    • pony (⭐3.7k) - ORM that provides a generator-oriented interface to SQL.
    • pydal (⭐519) - A pure Python Database Abstraction Layer.

Package Repositories

  • devpi (⭐1k) - PyPI server and packaging/testing/release tool.

Processes

  • sarge - Yet another wrapper for subprocess.

Recommender Systems

  • lightfm (⭐5k) - A Python implementation of a number of popular recommendation algorithms.
  • spotlight (⭐3k) - Deep recommender models using PyTorch.
  • Surprise (⭐6.6k) - A scikit for building and analyzing recommender systems.
  • tensorrec (⭐1.3k) - A Recommendation Engine Framework in TensorFlow.

Search

  • django-haystack (⭐3.7k) - Modular search for Django.
  • pysolr (⭐676) - A lightweight Python wrapper for Apache Solr.
  • whoosh - A fast, pure Python search engine library.

Serialization

  • marshmallow (⭐7.2k) - A lightweight library for converting complex objects to and from simple Python datatypes.
  • pysimdjson (⭐708) - A Python bindings for simdjson (⭐21k).
  • python-rapidjson (⭐515) - A Python wrapper around RapidJSON (⭐15k).

Specific Formats Processing

  • PDF
    • pdfminer.six (⭐6.6k) - Pdfminer.six is a community maintained fork of the original PDFMiner.
    • PyPDF2 (⭐9.2k) - A library capable of splitting, merging and transforming PDF pages.
    • ReportLab - Allowing Rapid creation of rich PDF documents.

Static Site Generator

  • lektor (⭐3.9k) - An easy to use static CMS and blog engine.
  • nikola (⭐2.7k) - A static website and blog generator.

Tagging

  • django-taggit (⭐3.4k) - Simple tagging for Django.

Template Engine

  • Genshi - Python templating toolkit for generation of web-aware output.

Text Processing

  • Unique identifiers
    • hashids (⭐1.4k) - Implementation of hashids in Python.
    • shortuuid (⭐2.1k) - A generator library for concise, unambiguous and URL-safe UUIDs.

Video

  • moviepy - A module for script-based movie editing with many formats, including animated GIFs.

Web Asset Management

  • django-compressor (⭐2.8k) - Compresses linked and inline JavaScript or CSS into a single cached file.
  • django-pipeline (⭐1.5k) - An asset packaging library for Django.
  • django-storages (⭐2.9k) - A collection of custom storage back ends for Django.
  • fanstatic - Packages, optimizes, and serves static file dependencies as Python packages.
  • fileconveyor - A daemon to detect and sync files to CDNs, S3 and FTP.
  • flask-assets (⭐458) - Helps you integrate webassets into your Flask app.
  • webassets (⭐928) - Bundles, optimizes, and manages unique cache-busting URLs for static resources.

Web Crawling

  • grab (⭐2.4k) - Site scraping framework.

WebSocket

  • autobahn-python (⭐2.5k) - WebSocket & WAMP for Python on Twisted and asyncio.

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Nov 07 - Nov 13, 2016
entry.content:
Admin Panels

  • flask-admin (⭐6k) - Simple and extensible administrative interface framework for Flask.
  • flower (⭐6.8k) - Real-time monitor and web admin for Celery.

Caching

  • django-cache-machine (⭐880) - Automatic caching and invalidation for Django models.
  • django-cacheops (⭐2.2k) - A slick ORM cache with automatic granular event-driven invalidation.

Data Validation

  • schema (⭐2.9k) - A library for validating Python data structures.
  • voluptuous (⭐1.8k) - A Python data validation library.

Debugging Tools

  • Others
    • django-debug-toolbar (⭐8.3k) - Display various debug information for Django.
    • flask-debugtoolbar (⭐964) - A port of the django-debug-toolbar to flask.
    • icecream (⭐9.8k) - Inspect variables, expressions, and program execution with a single, simple function call.
    • pyelftools (⭐2.1k) - Parsing and analyzing ELF files and DWARF debugging information.

Documentation

  • sphinx (⭐7.2k) - Python Documentation generator.
    • awesome-sphinxdoc (⭐953)

Editor Plugins and IDEs

  • Vim
    • jedi-vim (⭐5.3k) - Vim bindings for the Jedi auto-completion library for Python.
    • python-mode (⭐5.5k) - An all in one plugin for turning Vim into a Python IDE.
    • YouCompleteMe (⭐26k) - Includes Jedi (⭐6k)-based completion engine for Python.
  • Visual Studio
    • PTVS (⭐2.5k) - Python Tools for Visual Studio.

File Manipulation

  • python-magic (⭐2.8k) - A Python interface to the libmagic file type identification library.
  • watchdog (⭐7k) - API and shell utilities to monitor file system events.

Functional Programming

  • funcy (⭐3.4k) - A fancy and practical functional tools.

GUI Development

  • Flexx (⭐3.3k) - Flexx is a pure Python toolkit for creating GUI's, that uses web technology for its rendering.
  • kivy - A library for creating NUI applications, running on Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, Android and iOS.
  • Tkinter - Tkinter is Python's de-facto standard GUI package.
  • Toga (⭐5.1k) - A Python native, OS native GUI toolkit.
  • urwid - A library for creating terminal GUI applications with strong support for widgets, events, rich colors, etc.

Game Development

  • Pygame - Pygame is a set of Python modules designed for writing games.
  • PyOgre - Python bindings for the Ogre 3D render engine, can be used for games, simulations, anything 3D.
  • PyOpenGL - Python ctypes bindings for OpenGL and it's related APIs.
  • RenPy - A Visual Novel engine.

Geolocation

  • geopy (⭐4.7k) - Python Geocoding Toolbox.

HTML Manipulation

  • bleach (⭐2.7k) - A whitelist-based HTML sanitization and text linkification library.
  • WeasyPrint - A visual rendering engine for HTML and CSS that can export to PDF.

HTTP Clients

  • treq (⭐594) - Python requests like API built on top of Twisted's HTTP client.

Hardware

  • scapy (⭐12k) - A brilliant packet manipulation library.

Image Processing

  • pillow (⭐13k) - Pillow is the friendly PIL fork.
  • python-qrcode (⭐4.7k) - A pure Python QR Code generator.
  • scikit-image - A Python library for (scientific) image processing.
  • thumbor (⭐10k) - A smart imaging service. It enables on-demand crop, re-sizing and flipping of images.

Interactive Interpreter

  • bpython (⭐2.7k) - A fancy interface to the Python interpreter.
  • ptpython (⭐5.3k) - Advanced Python REPL built on top of the python-prompt-toolkit (⭐9.8k).

Internationalization

  • Babel - An internationalization library for Python.
  • PyICU (⭐133) - A wrapper of International Components for Unicode C++ library (ICU).

Job Scheduler

  • django-schedule (⭐844) - A calendaring app for Django.
  • doit - A task runner and build tool.
  • gunnery (⭐765) - Multipurpose task execution tool for distributed systems with web-based interface.
  • Plan (⭐1.2k) - Writing crontab file in Python like a charm.
  • schedule (⭐12k) - Python job scheduling for humans.
  • Spiff (⭐1.8k) - A powerful workflow engine implemented in pure Python.

Machine Learning

  • NuPIC (⭐6.3k) - Numenta Platform for Intelligent Computing.
  • scikit-learn - The most popular Python library for Machine Learning.
  • vowpal_porpoise (⭐168) - A lightweight Python wrapper for Vowpal Wabbit (⭐8.6k).

Microsoft Windows

  • Python(x,y) - Scientific-applications-oriented Python Distribution based on Qt and Spyder.
  • pythonlibs - Unofficial Windows binaries for Python extension packages.
  • PythonNet (⭐5.2k) - Python Integration with the .NET Common Language Runtime (CLR).
  • WinPython - Portable development environment for Windows 7/8.

Miscellaneous

  • blinker (⭐1.9k) - A fast Python in-process signal/event dispatching system.
  • itsdangerous (⭐3k) - Various helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments.
  • pluginbase (⭐1.1k) - A simple but flexible plugin system for Python.

News Feed

  • django-activity-stream (⭐2.4k) - Generating generic activity streams from the actions on your site.

ORM

  • NoSQL Databases
    • hot-redis (⭐291) - Rich Python data types for Redis.
    • mongoengine (⭐4.3k) - A Python Object-Document-Mapper for working with MongoDB.
    • PynamoDB (⭐2.5k) - A Pythonic interface for Amazon DynamoDB.
    • redisco (⭐435) - A Python Library for Simple Models and Containers Persisted in Redis.

Package Management

  • conda (⭐7k) - Cross-platform, Python-agnostic binary package manager.

Permissions

  • django-guardian (⭐3.8k) - Implementation of per object permissions for Django 1.2+
  • django-rules (⭐1.9k) - A tiny but powerful app providing object-level permissions to Django, without requiring a database.

RESTful API

  • Flask
    • eve (⭐6.7k) - REST API framework powered by Flask, MongoDB and good intentions.
    • flask-api (⭐1.5k) - Browsable Web APIs for Flask.
    • flask-restful (⭐6.9k) - Quickly building REST APIs for Flask.

Serverless Frameworks

  • python-lambda (⭐1.5k) - A toolkit for developing and deploying Python code in AWS Lambda.

Specific Formats Processing

  • Office
    • docxtpl (⭐2.2k) - Editing a docx document by jinja2 template
    • openpyxl - A library for reading and writing Excel 2010 xlsx/xlsm/xltx/xltm files.
    • pyexcel (⭐1.3k) - Providing one API for reading, manipulating and writing csv, ods, xls, xlsx and xlsm files.
    • python-docx (⭐5.1k) - Reads, queries and modifies Microsoft Word 2007/2008 docx files.
    • python-pptx (⭐2.9k) - Python library for creating and updating PowerPoint (.pptx) files.
    • unoconv (⭐2.7k) - Convert between any document format supported by LibreOffice/OpenOffice.
    • XlsxWriter (⭐3.8k) - A Python module for creating Excel .xlsx files.
    • xlwings (⭐3.2k) - A BSD-licensed library that makes it easy to call Python from Excel and vice versa.
    • xlwt (⭐1k) / xlrd (⭐2.2k) - Writing and reading data and formatting information from Excel files.
  • Markdown
    • Mistune (⭐2.8k) - Fastest and full featured pure Python parsers of Markdown.
    • Python-Markdown (⭐4k) - A Python implementation of John Gruber’s Markdown.
  • CSV
    • csvkit (⭐6.2k) - Utilities for converting to and working with CSV.
  • Archive
    • unp (⭐440) - A command line tool that can unpack archives easily.

Template Engine

  • Mako - Hyperfast and lightweight templating for the Python platform.

Text Processing

  • Slugify
    • awesome-slugify (⭐487) - A Python slugify library that can preserve unicode.
    • python-slugify (⭐1.5k) - A Python slugify library that translates unicode to ASCII.
    • unicode-slugify (⭐321) - A slugifier that generates unicode slugs with Django as a dependency.
  • Parser
    • ply (⭐2.9k) - Implementation of lex and yacc parsing tools for Python.
    • pygments - A generic syntax highlighter.
    • pyparsing (⭐2.4k) - A general purpose framework for generating parsers.
    • python-nameparser (⭐676) - Parsing human names into their individual components.
    • python-phonenumbers (⭐3.6k) - Parsing, formatting, storing and validating international phone numbers.
    • python-user-agents (⭐1.5k) - Browser user agent parser.
    • sqlparse (⭐3.9k) - A non-validating SQL parser.

URL Manipulation

  • purl (⭐294) - A simple, immutable URL class with a clean API for interrogation and manipulation.
  • pyshorteners (⭐396) - A pure Python URL shortening lib.

Video

  • scikit-video (⭐142) - Video processing routines for SciPy.

Web Content Extracting

  • html2text (⭐2k) - Convert HTML to Markdown-formatted text.
  • lassie (⭐622) - Web Content Retrieval for Humans.
  • micawber (⭐657) - A small library for extracting rich content from URLs.
  • newspaper (⭐15k) - News extraction, article extraction and content curation in Python.
  • python-readability (⭐2.8k) - Fast Python port of arc90's readability tool.
  • sumy (⭐3.6k) - A module for automatic summarization of text documents and HTML pages.
  • textract (⭐4.2k) - Extract text from any document, Word, PowerPoint, PDFs, etc.
entry.summary: 75 awesome projects updated on Nov 07 - Nov 13, 2016

Science

  • bcbio-nextgen (⭐1k) - Providing best-practice pipelines for fully automated high throughput sequencing analysis.
  • PyDy - Short for Python Dynamics, used to assist with workflow in the modeling of dynamic motion.
  • Zipline (⭐19k) - A Pythonic algorithmic trading library.

Testing

    • PyAutoGUI (⭐12k) - PyAutoGUI is a cross-platform GUI automation Python module for human beings.
    • Schemathesis (⭐2.6k) - A tool for automatic property-based testing of web applications built with Open API / Swagger specifications.
    • Selenium - Python bindings for Selenium WebDriver.
    • sixpack (⭐1.8k) - A language-agnostic A/B Testing framework.
    • splinter (⭐2.8k) - Open source tool for testing web applications.

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Aug 31 - Sep 06, 2015
entry.content:
Testing

  • Mock
    • doublex - Powerful test doubles framework for Python.
    • freezegun (⭐4.4k) - Travel through time by mocking the datetime module.
    • httmock (⭐465) - A mocking library for requests for Python 2.6+ and 3.2+.
    • httpretty (⭐2.1k) - HTTP request mock tool for Python.
    • mock - (Python standard library) A mocking and patching library.
    • mocket (⭐296) - A socket mock framework with gevent/asyncio/SSL support.
    • responses (⭐4.3k) - A utility library for mocking out the requests Python library.
    • VCR.py (⭐2.8k) - Record and replay HTTP interactions on your tests.
  • Object Factories
    • factory_boy (⭐3.7k) - A test fixtures replacement for Python.
    • mixer (⭐948) - Another fixtures replacement. Supports Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy, Peewee and etc.
    • model_mommy (⭐900) - Creating random fixtures for testing in Django.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Aug 31 - Sep 06, 2015

entry.title: Awesome Python Updates on Aug 17 - Aug 23, 2015
entry.content:
HTML Manipulation

  • html5lib (⭐1.2k) - A standards-compliant library for parsing and serializing HTML documents and fragments.
  • lxml - A very fast, easy-to-use and versatile library for handling HTML and XML.
  • pyquery (⭐2.4k) - A jQuery-like library for parsing HTML.
  • xmltodict (⭐5.6k) - Working with XML feel like you are working with JSON.

Processes

  • sh (⭐7.1k) - A full-fledged subprocess replacement for Python.

Science

  • astropy - A community Python library for Astronomy.
  • bccb (⭐624) - Collection of useful code related to biological analysis.
  • Biopython - Biopython is a set of freely available tools for biological computation.
  • cclib - A library for parsing and interpreting the results of computational chemistry packages.
  • NumPy - A fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
  • PyMC (⭐9.1k) - Markov Chain Monte Carlo sampling toolkit.
  • statsmodels (⭐11k) - Statistical modeling and econometrics in Python.
  • SymPy (⭐14k) - A Python library for symbolic mathematics.

Third-party APIs

  • google-api-python-client (⭐8.3k) - Google APIs Client Library for Python.
  • gspread (⭐7.3k) - Google Spreadsheets Python API.
  • twython (⭐1.9k) - A Python wrapper for the Twitter API.
